name: alarm_setMode
description: This function is used to set the alarm mode of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the alarm mode.

parameters.name: predefinedAlarmMode
parameters.description: The predefined alarm mode to set (e.g., siren).
